outputs.output_descr: The project is designed to develop the capacities of the National Committee for Demining & Rehabilitation (NCDR) and Royal Engineering Corps (REC) to undertake mine clearance based on UN international mine action standards (IMAS). Specifically, the capacity development components of the project aimed to contribute to the technical and managerial capacity of the two organizations so that clearance would be conducted in a safer and more efficient manner in the future.

project_descr: Support to the National Committee for Demining & Rehabiliation in Jordan
project_title: Support for the National Committee for Demining & Rehab
